name: JIRA Golem (Discontinued)
description:
Dark theme for Atlassian JIRA. 

This was created mostly for personal use, but I thought I'd throw it up here for others to build off of. I personally dont use several JIRA features, so I might not have touched some pages yet. I'll try to update the them per request, but please feel free to make any personal edits you'd like :)
additional_info:
** I'm no longer supporting this style, but feel free to use it as a jumping-off point for your own! ** Change Log: 20170727
  • Re-enabled Priority Images
20170413
  • Added h4 and h5
20170323
  • Fix for time estimate/remaining graphs. Credit: Andrew Ayers
  • Recolored some annoying "hint" text on the Edit Comment popup
  • Added green color to .code-quote in code blocks
  • Got rid of the Confluence stuff because it doesnt do anything when we're using the current url-prefixes that exclude confluence
20170220
  • Fixed text color on search suggestions
  • Updated URL exceptions so that the style only affects JIRA
20170123 I personally dont use several JIRA features, so I havent touched those views yet. I'll try to update the them per request, but please feel free to make any edits you'd like.
  • Fixed white background boxes on Project Boards
20170118
  • Fixed background and hover on several dropdowns
  • Dark Scrollbars (Thanks https://gist.github.com/devinrhode2/2573411, accessed via https://userstyles.org/styles/116696/jira-dark-nightshift-eye-care-based)
Inspired by Jira Smooth Dark by KeVVa
